oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bordeaux Garden Park, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1966
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A landscape and construction view of Bordeaux Garden Park, at Snell Road near County Hospital in Davidson County, Tennessee. At the request of the people of Bordeaux represented by Councilmen Arch Carney and James Bates, the County Hospital leased the land to the Park Board in 1964. Funding from a 1964 bond issue was used to construct a playground and ball diamond in the park. Forms part of Metro Archives Record Group 327, Metro Parks and Recreation Collection. 1 b & w photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parks--Tennessee--Nashville; Urban parks--Tennessee--Nashville
